ParameterSet.name: CameraParameters
ParameterSet.description: Settings for the PCL visualizer camera.

Parameter.name: xCoordinateLocation
Parameter.description: the x coordinate of the camera location

Parameter.name: yCoordinateLocation
Parameter.description: the y coordinate of the camera location

Parameter.name: zCoordinateLocation
Parameter.description: the z coordinate of the camera location

Parameter.name: xViewComponent
Parameter.description: the x component of the view point of the camera

Parameter.name: yViewComponent
Parameter.description: the y component of the view point of the camera

Parameter.name: zViewComponent
Parameter.description: the z component of the view point of the camera

Parameter.name: xUpComponent
Parameter.description: the x component of the view up direction of the camera

Parameter.name: yUpComponent
Parameter.description: the y component of the view up direction of the camera

Parameter.name: zUpComponent
Parameter.description: the z component of the view up direction of the camera
